title: A Detective Named Abby: Game Night Fight
description: Card games. Makeup. Wine. A late arrival, a nosey neighbor and four dead friends. What happened to this clique of corpses? It’s up to Detective Forthwright to shuffle through the clues and place a bet with the hand she’s been dealt. Will she fold or will she beat the odds?Deal yourself into the game. Can you solve the mystery of Game Night Fight?
author: Breezy Kinkade
